file.toolTipText: Directory or path to read from

select.toolTipText: New log file generation format (daily, weekly, monthly)

string.toolTipText: Hostname of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

integer.toolTipText: Port number of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

select.toolTipText: Data routing (normalized alerts to Manager and/or raw data to nDepth)

integer.toolTipText: Number of seconds between log reads

FastPattern.description: 20, PolicyAccess: Microsoft Routing and Remote Access Service Policy
FastPattern.pattern: [\d.]+,[^,]*,[/\d]{10},[\d:]{8},RAS,[^\s,]+,.*Microsoft Routing and Remote Access Service Policy,\d+,\d+,\d+,[\w]+\\\S+,.*

FastPattern.description: 21, PolicyAccess: Microsoft Routing and Remote Access Service Policy {fmt 2}
FastPattern.pattern: [\d.]+,[^,]*,[/\d]{10},[\d:]{8},RAS,[^\s,]+,.*4129,[\w]+\\\S+,\d+,\d+,\d+,Microsoft Routing and Remote Access Service Policy,

FastPattern.description: 22, PolicyAccess: Microsoft Routing and Remote Access Service Policy {fmt 3}
